#summary Utility program to convert VAMAS files into VAMAS-XML
#labels DC19

The VAMAS Parser is a small Java utility which converts VAMAS data exchange files into a custom XML format [VAMASXML]. The program takes a single .vms file as an argument and outputs directly to STDOUT.

[http://code.google.com/p/ands-la-trobe/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fdc19%2FVAMASParser The VAMASParser source is available here]
